name: Vile Game
description:
A UE4 recreation of a game I made some time ago in Unity, based off of the Banjo Kazooie Mr. Vile mini game. Three small levels, the goal is to collect more of the pickups than the enemy player.

Depending on the color of the pickup, it will either add or subtract points.

Github here : https://github.com/JayBarton/VileGame
